snippet.title: Broken Edge | Announcement Teaser Trailer (Meta Quest 2, Steam VR)
snippet.description:
Broken Edge | Announcement Teaser Trailer (Meta Quest 2, Steam VR)
Broken Edge is a VR multiplayer fantasy duelling game where you embody historical swordfighters. Use their unique techniques and powers combined with cutting-edge fencing mechanics to claim victory against online components and climb the ranks!

Coming 2022 to Meta Quest 2 & SteamVR.

Join the blade-cutting community on Discord at https://discord.gg/Pj5aGCHFPQ

and stay tuned on the following social channels:

• Twitter - https://twitter.com/BrokenEdgeVR
• Facebook - https://facebook.com/BrokenEdgeVR
• Instagram - https://instagram.com/BrokenEdgeVR

Broken Edge is developed by TREBUCHET and published by Fast Travel Games.

#VirtualReality #BrokenEdgeVR #VR
